summary: This is an email from an FBI Special Agent in New York forwarding subpoena returns from Microsoft and Apple to a recipient, likely related to the Epstein investigation. It includes attachments of account reports and business records.

persons.name: Special Agent FBI New York VCAC/Human Trafficking
persons.context: The sender of the email who is forwarding subpoena returns from Microsoft and Apple related to the investigation.

events.title: Subpoena issued to Microsoft
events.description: A subpoena was issued to Microsoft, likely for account information or business records as part of the Epstein investigation.
personsInvolved: Special Agent FBI New York VCAC/Human Trafficking

keyFacts: Subpoenas were issued to technology companies Microsoft and Apple as part of the Epstein investigation.
The FBI's New York VCAC/Human Trafficking unit was involved in obtaining these records.
The document includes specific file attachments: a Microsoft subpoena, a Microsoft account report, an Apple confidential spreadsheet, and a business records certification.
The email was sent on January 22, 2019, forwarding returns from subpoenas likely executed in late 2018.
